label: Pre Conversion Function
helpText:
If you configure here a JavaScript function, this function will get in the first paramater the raw Markdown text and must return the modified Markdown text, which will be send then to the converter.

Example:

function (text) { 
    /*add a level 1 header*/
    return "# Converted text follows\n\n" + text; 
}

ATTENTION: There is only one converter for all conversions on a page. If you configure here a function to modify the raw Markdown then this will applied to all conversions
